column1: Smoque BBQ////This place easily deserves all the praise it gets. I would 100% recommend Smoque
column2: and of all the BBQ places that exist in the Midwest Smoque holds its own ground even compared to much of the BBQ I've had in the South. You have to prepare to wait through the line to order for dine-in
column3: and numerous people called in to take their orders to go
column4: which might be the right choice given the small confines of the restaurant. I came with 3 friends
column5: and we waited for about 30 minutes
column6: which wasn't as painful as it sounds as we were inundated with the smell of the delicious food to come. By the time we ordered
column7: we didn't even have to wait at all to score a 4 person table
column8: a big plus as I was afraid we wouldn't have a place in time for our meal.
